name: Excavator Toy
description: Double the fun! Our construction truck toy set comes with one excavator truck and one dump truck. Excavator can be used to dig huge pieces of land and dump truck can be used to transport sand, gravel and even little toys from one place to another.

name: Teddy Bear
description: Teddy Bears are soft and dependable, always there to listen and support. They do what they are asked and show little personal initiative. They do not question those in authority but respect superior status and admire firmness and decisiveness.

name: Dolls Trailer
description: A doll is a model typically of a human or humanoid character, often used as a toy for children, especially little girls. Dolls have also been used in traditional religious rituals throughout the world. Traditional dolls made of materials such as clay and wood

name: Mermaid Doll
description: A Barbie mermaid doll with removable headpiece Make a storytelling splash with mermaid dolls from Barbie Dreamtopia!This Barbie mermaid doll shines in a colourful bodice and super-sparkly tail with whimsical details

name: Construction Cup
description: Construction Cup toy made of 100% silicone (BPA-free, latex-free) They are dishwasher safe and won't leave any residue or marks on your tables, windows and other flat surfaces.

name: Dinasarur Juno
description: Walking dinosaur toys features realistic movie details like skin texture,  realistic scales, horns, teeth and signature stripe.Kids will be enthused to receive this attractive electric dinosaur toy

name: Genius Tray
description: Tray toy suctions to any smooth, flat surface New squishy material featured on the bumps for texture and added manipulation Rainbow wheel creates Rainbow effect and spokes light up when spun.

name: Baby Girl Toy
description: Plump, soft, and huggable, the 12in baby doll from Manhattan Toys features embroidered facial expressions, drawing attention with a warm smile and hook closures at the back for easy changing and handling.

name: Blocks Build Toy
description: Blocks enhance children's problem-solving abilities, mathematics skills, and language and literacy abilities. And constructing “creations” builds selfesteem and feelings of success.

name: NEAR FOREST BLOG
description: Tour guides require strong communication and public speaking skills to convey information effectively. In addition, active listening skills ensure tourists get your full attention. This skill also helps you understand any questions you receive during a tour.
